scripts.build: node build.js && marp presentation.output.md -o presentation.html --allow-local-files --html --theme presentation-styles.css
scripts.export:pdf: npm run build && marp presentation.md --pdf --allow-local-files --theme presentation-styles.css
scripts.export:pptx: npm run build && marp presentation.md --pptx --allow-local-files --theme presentation-styles.css
